alert.note: Alert for Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 5:04PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 504 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nashville, Okawville, Lively Grove, Hoyleton, Johannisburg, Covington, Addieville, New Minden, Venedy, Frogtown, Elkton, Stone Church and Huegely.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
